listitem.para: Erases all unburied procedures, variables, and property lists from the workspace.
By default, ERALL will warn you about what you are about to do. ERALL inputs an optional parameter that controls if this warning should be displayed. If you pass in FALSE, the warning is supressed.

listitem.programlisting:
TO FOO END
TO BAR END
SHOW PROCEDURES [bar foo] (ERALL "false) SHOW PROCEDURES []
